availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Gaupin (Jefferson County, KY, flour dealer & grocer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, grocer and flour dealer. Native of France. Married to Mary Ann Humbert Gaupin in Jefferson County on September 21, 1846. Father of Edward Gaupin, Charles Gaupin, and Mary Louise Gaupin. Signed a petition as a flour dealer in May 1861 to appoint W. G. Timberlake as flour inspector. Grocer in Louisville in 1865.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000818480, p. 63.
